root.name: Outpost Kaloki
root.description: OverviewOutpost Kaloki, produced by NinjaBee is a tycoon style game where the player builds a space station to meet specific story goals. Released for Windows 18th September 2004 it was successful enough to warrant a successor on the Xbox 360, Outpost Kaloki X.Outpost Kaloki was featured in the Direct2Drive May 2011 Indie Sack Pack Bundle.System RequirementsOS: Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows XPCPU: 450 MHzMemory: 128MB RAMGraphics: 3D Graphics Card 8MB, supporting OpenGL 1.1 or later
